author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-3I Infrastructure Says ‍Board Approved Payment Of Special Dividend
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - 3I Infrastructure Plc:
* ‍BOARD OF COMPANY HAS APPROVED PAYMENT OF A SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF £425 MILLION IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN AN EFFICIENT BALANCE SHEET​
* ‍A SHARE CONSOLIDATION IS PROPOSED, WITH EVERY 19 EXISTING ORDINARY SHARES BEING CONSOLIDATED INTO 15 NEW ORDINARY SHARES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
